structure.unit: ARTICLE LVII. MIAMI-DADE COUNTY ADVISORY BOARD FOR MINORITY AND WOMEN-OWNED BUSINESSES

text.section:
Sec. 2-703. Conflict of interest waiver.
Sections(c) and (d) of the Conflict of Interest and Code of Ethics Ordinance of Miami-Dade County are waived for advisory board members for transactions arising from the exercise of those powers given the advisory board by this ordinance.
